programme.title: Letters From the Heart
programme.desc: Hope’s Nona passes away, and upon Hopes return to Cherry Valley for the funeral, she learns she is to inherit a large sum of money, with one condition.

programme.title: Heart of the Manor
programme.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, Real Estate agent Lisa Bentron finds herself in competition with handsome developer Matthew Wallace when he wants to buy her family's historic estate. But could he hold the key to Liz's heart?

programme.title: Inspiring Love
programme.desc: Shy artist Isla is shocked when her painting is accidentally sold to charismatic salesman Mark, whose boss wants to comission Isla for a sculpture. Mark, hoping to impress his boss, talks Isla up and gets her to do the job, but there's one problem...Isla's never sculpted before. With Mark's encouragement, Isla's confidence blossoms and so does their love.

programme.title: Beauty and The Billionaire
programme.desc: Addison gets roped into traveling overseas with her brother and his picky billionaire boss. But clashing with the billionaire is no vacation, until he starts to have a change of heart.

programme.title: The Farmer and the Belle – Saving Santaland
programme.desc: When she visits her childhood home, sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

programme.title: The Farmer and the Belle – Saving Santaland
programme.desc: When she visits her childhood home, sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

programme.title: Hope Ranch
programme.desc: A young girl has it all—a beautiful ranch, a horse named Faith, and the love of her family. But after the death of her military father, she and her mother are in danger of losing their family ranch too. With a little help from friends and their majestic white horse, they hatch a plan to raise enough money to save the ranch while learning to never lose hope, despite all odds.

programme.desc: When she visits her childhood home, sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

programme.title: Hope Ranch
programme.desc: A young girl has it all—a beautiful ranch, a horse named Faith, and the love of her family. But after the death of her military father, she and her mother are in danger of losing their family ranch too. With a little help from friends and their majestic white horse, they hatch a plan to raise enough money to save the ranch while learning to never lose hope, despite all odds.

programme.title: Ruling of the Heart
programme.desc: Judge Morgan has become known for his no-nonsense toughness in court. He rules fast and he rules hard, barely noticing the person on the other end of his decisions. When he gets stuck in a cafe during a snowstorm, he is surprised to discover two of the other customers stranded with him happen to be people recently in his court, with verdicts handed down that have made him very unpopular. As the night unfolds in the small cafe, unexpected truth emerges from both sides that changes everything.
